Articles.Content:
Salutations.

After requesting KSP LEGO on Closette\'s 'KSP Merch' thread, I had an idea for a thread of my own.

Show me a Lego rocket that you have built.

I\'ll start:

I\'m too lazy to take photos, so I\'ll just link it. 3368

GO!
Stickers may be forthcoming, along with a better build overall.

Man, I remember only having Legos shaped like bricks and you had to use a lot of imagination to build things. Now a days it seems like they are just snap together pre-built toys. No imagination required.

Now... get offa mah lawn!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Man, I remember only having Legos shaped like bricks and you had to use a lot of imagination to build things. Now a days it seems like they are just snap together pre-built toys. No imagination required.

Now... get offa mah lawn!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Hah, I guess.

Hah, I guess.

I have a wagon full of Legos.

(Still have them from when I was five...)

Man, I remember only having Legos shaped like bricks and you had to use a lot of imagination to build things. Now a days it seems like they are just snap together pre-built toys. No imagination required.

+1.

Sadly I do not have pictures of Lego rockets I used to build 25 years ago...

Yep. From bricks))

I have a wagon full of Legos.

(Still have them from when I was five...)

Same here, only its a huge plastic box, oh back in the day...
